alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lake, southwestern Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Four Corners, or near Bay Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kissimmee, Windermere, Bay Lake, Celebration and Four Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
